rukus.text: Anata gata shinko suru mono yo, godo reihai no hi no reihai no yobikake ga tonae raretanaraba, arra o nenjiru koto ni isogi, shobai kara hanare nasai. Moshi anata gata ga wakatte irunaraba, sore ga anata gata no tame ni mottomo yoi
Reihai ga owattanaraba, anata gata wa katagata ni chiri, arra no onkei o motomete, arra o tataete oku 唱念 Shi nasai. Kanarazu anata gata wa sakaerudearou

Shikashi kare-ra wa, umai moke ya asobi-goto o mikakeru to,(reihai no tame ni) tachinobotte iru anata o tokan ni shite, sochira ni kakedasu shimatsu. Itte yaru ga i. `Arra no omoto (no onkei) wa, yugi ya torihiki yori mo masaru. Arra wa, saizen no kyuyo-sha de ara reru
